title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #86
body:
## Date and Time

June 7, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [The Merge](https://ethereumcatherders.com/the_merge/) 
  - Merge Community Call # 4 [Recording](https://youtu.be/qG-A5i6x6N8)
  - [AllCoreDevs Update 011](https://hackmd.io/@timbeiko/acd/https%3A%2F%2Ftim.mirror.xyz%2FPWFVaHY3Mrx7srarMmuBWya0J5kioR1l2xaH3p5APDk%3Fdisplay%3Diframe) & [What’s New in Eth2 - 6 May 2022](https://hackmd.io/@benjaminion/eth2_news/https%3A%2F%2Fhackmd.io%2F%40benjaminion%2Fwnie2_220506)
  - [Ropsten TTD Announcement](https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/06/03/ropsten-merge-ttd/)
    - [The Ethereum Merge Community Call Series](https://ethstaker.cc/the-ethereum-merge-community-call-series/)
    - Ropsten hosted by the EthStaker Community | Wednesday, June 8th [Livestream](https://youtu.be/2OfRuKSPjjw)

- [Shanghai specs](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/shanghai.md), [Tracker](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/projects/1)

### 2. New initiatives
- [GitPoap badges](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/134)
- ECH GitHub backup
- ECH YouTube backup

### 3. Events & hackathon
- [EthPrague](https://ethprague.com/) June 10-12, 2022 , [Press Release](https://ethprague.com/pressrelease.pdf) - 

### 4. ECH updates
- [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - Need Ruby dev
  - [EIP bot](https://github.com/ethereum/EIP-Bot/issues) & [EIPV](https://github.com/ethereum/eipv/issues)
  - [Learn2Earn](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- Cat blazers 
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- ECH Operations 
  - ECH Podcast ([PEEPanEIP](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA))
  - All Wallet Devs meeting
  - Adding zkDoof to ECH Ops team
- [EIP Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - [URL/URI standard working group](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/URLWorkingGroup)
  - All Core Dev meeting [notes 139](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/542)
  - Consensus meeting [notes 88](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/541) 
  - EIP Improvement Process [meeting 57](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/pull/143)
  - EIP editors apprentice meeting 18 [Recording](https://youtu.be/Mr6G2823-S0) 

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 85](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20085.md)

 Anything else?

#### The date for the next meeting - June 21, 2022.
